name: Streaming beam Python flex template
description: Streaming beam example for python flex template.

parameters.name: pipeline
parameters.label: Dataflow pipeline name
parameters.helpText: Name of the dataflow pipeline to run.

parameters.name: state_code
parameters.label: State code
parameters.helpText: State that the pipeline is running for.

parameters.name: ingest_instance
parameters.label: Ingest instance
parameters.helpText: Ingest instance that the pipeline is running for.

parameters.name: metric_types
parameters.label: Metric types
parameters.helpText: Metric types to collect for this pipeline.

parameters.name: calculation_month_count
parameters.label: Number of months to calculate
parameters.helpText: The number of months to limit the monthly calculation output to. If set to -1, does not limit the calculations.

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: Test output dataset
parameters.helpText: If specified, the pipeline will write results to this test dataset.

parameters.name: state_data_input
parameters.label: BigQuery dataset to query for state entities
parameters.helpText: If specified, the pipeline will query this dataset instead of the default.

parameters.name: normalized_input
parameters.label: BigQuery dataset to query for normalized versions of entities
parameters.helpText: If specified, the pipeline will query this BigQuery dataset for normalized versions of entities.

parameters.name: reference_view_input
parameters.label: BigQuery reference view dataset to query
parameters.helpText: If specified, the pipeline will query this BigQuery reference view dataset instead of the default.

parameters.name: person_filter_ids
parameters.label: A list of person ids to filter for
parameters.helpText: An optional list of DB person_id values. When present, the pipeline will only calculate metrics for these people and will not output to BQ.
